Articles.Content: I've been searching around for some dedicated iPhone 5 KSP wallpapers... It would be really neat if someone could make some... Or point me in the direction of where I can find them

I've been searching around for some dedicated iPhone 5 KSP wallpapers... It would be really neat if someone could make some... Or point me in the direction of where I can find them

I haven't seen any, but I've designed my own wallpapers before. Maybe I could do a couple. What's an IPhone's resolution?
There are some on the KSP Tumblr, scroll down to the bottom of this page http://kerbaldevteam.tumblr.com/page/6
I've just created my own by sending my screenshot to my phone and then selecting it to use as my wallpaper. Simples.

I've got the old load screen picture of Jeb Bill and Bob that looks like its painted. I want it on a tshirt too though. if a squad approved one is or becomes available ill buy one. I just copied the image from a link in the forum. And made into screen saver on my phone. It's sideways but that's how I use my phone most anyhoo. Can't remember the thread with the link. I think it might have been before the forum crash.

Oriented vertically or horizontal?

Google says 1136 x 640 pixels.
